short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flower Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Flowers background. Custom Flower wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Flower wallpapers with each new tab opened.
2. Toggle or favorite Flower backgrounds via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites rapidly.
10. Instant links to Google applications.
11. Direct access to additional themes.
12. Simplified sharing options for social media.
13. Immediate access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick links to game portals.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Flower new tab.
